snippet: Spain’s Sergio Garcia fired an impressive six-under-par 64 to take the halfway lead at the BMW Championship on Friday, with world number one Rory McIlroy only two off the pace after another 67....

headline.print_headline: Garcia Surges to BMW Summit, McIlroy Lurks
headline.main: Garcia Surges to BMW Summit, McIlroy Lurks

lead_paragraph: Spain’s Sergio Garcia fired an impressive six-under-par 64 to take the halfway lead at the BMW Championship on Friday, with world number one Rory McIlroy only two off the pace after another 67.
